articles.author: Craig Meyer
articles.title: Cooper Flagg injury update: Duke star ruled out after hurting ankle in ACC Tournament - USA TODAY
articles.description: Cooper Flagg hurt his left ankle in Duke's ACC tournament game vs. Georgia Tech and will miss the rest of the game.
articles.content:
With Selection Sunday three days away, perhaps the biggest star in college basketballs playing status is suddenly in doubt.
Duke freshman phenom Cooper Flagg left the Blue Devils ACC tournament quar… [+2211 chars]
